sn47.38:1.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kaye kayanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.38:1.4: Tassa kaye kayanupassino viharato kayo parinnato hoti.
sn47.38:2.1: Vedanasu vedananupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.38:2.2: Tassa vedanasu vedananupassino viharato vedana parinnata honti.
sn47.38:3.1: Citte cittanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.38:3.2: Tassa citte cittanupassino viharato cittam parinnatam hoti.
sn47.38:4.1: Dhammesu dhammanupassi viharati atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam.
sn47.38:4.2: Tassa dhammesu dhammanupassino viharato dhamma parinnata honti.
